summary:
- **FY25 Hydro Generation**: 3,410 GWh (17% lower YoY), 4th lowest since 1980 due to 12th percentile Waikato catchment inflows.  
- **Revised Mean Hydro Generation**: Increased to **4,140 GWh annually** from FY26 onward, driven by Karāpiro Rehabilitation Project (+16.5MW capacity, +32GWh/year) and Digital River AI platform.  
- **Karāpiro Project Completion**: Final unit replacement finishes Sep-25, concluding 3-year upgrade.  
- **Market Prices**: FY25 Auckland spot average **$216/MWh**; FY26-27 forward prices eased to **$179/MWh**.  
- **Quarterly Hydrology**: Ended at 79th percentile (improved from dry start), boosting FY26 storage.  
- **Total FY25 Generation**: **7,906 GWh** (down 11% YoY), with declines in wind (-6%) and geothermal (-2%).
